Name: Poison Apple
Description: When drawn or taken, you must discard a card from your hand and discard this card. If you cannot discard a card from your hand, you are eliminated.

Name: Lush Apple
Description: Take the top card from the discard pile.

Name: Mystic Apple
Description: Look at the top 3 cards in the deck and replace them in any order.

Name: Crystal Apple
Description: Play every card in your hand one by one.

Name: Golden Apple
Description: Look at another player's cards and play one of them.

Name: Cosmic Apple
Description: After you play this card, you win the game. You cannot play this card the same turn that you draw it. When discarded, it is shuffled back into the deck.

Name: Fire Apple
Description: Target player discards up to two cards from their hand at random.

Name: Lightning Apple
Description: Play the next two cards in the deck in order. This triggers 'when drawn' effects.
